name: gen_image
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool thai_lottery_result_image.
Tool description: Thai Lottery Result Image
API description: Generates an image based on specified parameters by making a request to the Thai Lottery Result Image API.

date.description: The date for which to generate the image. Defaults to '01062564'.

bgimg.description: The background image to use. Optional.

rmber.description: A flag indicating whether certain elements (like numbers) should be removed. Optional.
